segment.source: Description: You can generate promotional codes for an app or in-app product (IAP) that you have published in the Windows Store.
segment.target: Description: You can generate promotional codes for an app or in-app product (IAP) that you have published in the Windows Store.

segment.source: title: Generate promotional codes
segment.target: title: Generate promotional codes

segment.source: Generate promotional codes
segment.target: Generate promotional codes

segment.source: You can generate promotional codes for an app or in-app product (IAP) that you have published in the Windows Store.
segment.target: You can generate promotional codes for an app or in-app product (IAP) that you have published in the Windows Store.

segment.source: Promotional codes are an easy way to give influential users free access to your app or IAP.
segment.target: Promotional codes are an easy way to give influential users free access to your app or IAP.

segment.source: You might also use promotional codes to address customer service scenarios by giving users free access to your app or IAP, or for beta testing with Windows 10.
segment.target: You might also use promotional codes to address customer service scenarios by giving users free access to your app or IAP, or for beta testing with Windows 10.

segment.source: Each promotional code has a corresponding unique redeemable URL that you can distribute to a user.
segment.target: Each promotional code has a corresponding unique redeemable URL that you can distribute to a user.

segment.source: The user can simply click the URL to redeem the code and install your app or IAP from the Windows Store.
segment.target: The user can simply click the URL to redeem the code and install your app or IAP from the Windows Store.

segment.source: On the Windows Dev Center dashboard, you can:
segment.target: On the Windows Dev Center dashboard, you can:

segment.source: Order a set of promotional codes for your app.
segment.target: Order a set of promotional codes for your app.

segment.source: Download a fulfilled promotional codes order.
segment.target: Download a fulfilled promotional codes order.

segment.source: Review promotional code usage for your apps, including:
segment.target: Review promotional code usage for your apps, including:

segment.source: Summaries of promotional code orders for all your apps (on the Dashboard overview page) and for each app individually (on the App overview page for each app).
segment.target: Summaries of promotional code orders for all your apps (on the Dashboard overview page) and for each app individually (on the App overview page for each app).

segment.source: A detailed summary of promotional code orders for each app (on the Promotional codes page for each app).
segment.target: A detailed summary of promotional code orders for each app (on the Promotional codes page for each app).

segment.source: Note You can generate promotional codes even if you have selected the Hide this app and prevent acquisition. Customers with a promotional code can still download it on Windows 10 devices option on the Pricing and availability dashboard page for your app.
segment.target: Note You can generate promotional codes even if you have selected the Hide this app and prevent acquisition. Customers with a promotional code can still download it on Windows 10 devices option on the Pricing and availability dashboard page for your app.

segment.source: Your app must pass the final publishing phase of the app certification process before users can redeem a promotional code to install it.
segment.target: Your app must pass the final publishing phase of the app certification process before users can redeem a promotional code to install it.

segment.source: Promotional code policies
segment.target: Promotional code policies

segment.source: Be aware of the following policies for promotional codes:
segment.target: Be aware of the following policies for promotional codes:

segment.source: You can generate promotional codes for any app or IAP that you published to the Windows Store.
segment.target: You can generate promotional codes for any app or IAP that you published to the Windows Store.

segment.source: Users can redeem the codes on any versions of Windows that are supported by your app or IAP.
segment.target: Users can redeem the codes on any versions of Windows that are supported by your app or IAP.

segment.source: Promotional codes expire 6 months after the date you order them.
segment.target: Promotional codes expire 6 months after the date you order them.

segment.source: For each of your apps or IAPs, you can generate up to 250 promotional codes every 6 months.
segment.target: For each of your apps or IAPs, you can generate up to 250 promotional codes every 6 months.

segment.source: The 6 month period begins when the first promotional code order is submitted.
segment.target: The 6 month period begins when the first promotional code order is submitted.

segment.source: You must follow the requirements defined in the App Developer Agreement, including section 3k. Promotional Codes.
segment.target: You must follow the requirements defined in the App Developer Agreement, including section 3k. Promotional Codes.

segment.source: Order promotional codes
segment.target: Order promotional codes

segment.source: To order promotional codes for an app or IAP that you published to the Windows Store:
segment.target: To order promotional codes for an app or IAP that you published to the Windows Store:

segment.source: On Windows Dev Center dashboard, do one of the following:
segment.target: On Windows Dev Center dashboard, do one of the following:

segment.source: On the App overview page for your app, locate the Promotional codes section and click Order codes.
segment.target: On the App overview page for your app, locate the Promotional codes section and click Order codes.

segment.source: On any dashboard page for your app, in the left navigation menu, expand Monetization and click Promotional codes.
segment.target: On any dashboard page for your app, in the left navigation menu, expand Monetization and click Promotional codes.

segment.source: On the Promotional codes page, click Order codes.
segment.target: On the Promotional codes page, click Order codes.

segment.source: On the New promotional codes order page, enter the following:
segment.target: On the New promotional codes order page, enter the following:

segment.source: Select the app or IAP for which you want to generate codes.
segment.target: Select the app or IAP for which you want to generate codes.

segment.source: Specify a name for the order.
segment.target: Specify a name for the order.

segment.source: You can use this name to differentiate between different orders of codes when reviewing your promotional code usage data.
segment.target: You can use this name to differentiate between different orders of codes when reviewing your promotional code usage data.

segment.source: Specify the quantity of codes to order.
segment.target: Specify the quantity of codes to order.

segment.source: Click Order codes.
segment.target: Click Order codes.

segment.source: The order is submitted and the dashboard navigates you to the Promotional codes page, where the new order is listed as Pending in the summary table of promotional code orders.
segment.target: The order is submitted and the dashboard navigates you to the Promotional codes page, where the new order is listed as Pending in the summary table of promotional code orders.

segment.source: Promotional codes are usually available for download within 60 minutes of placing the order, although some orders may take longer to process.
segment.target: Promotional codes are usually available for download within 60 minutes of placing the order, although some orders may take longer to process.

segment.source: After your order is fulfilled and the codes are available for download, the order status changes to Available.
segment.target: After your order is fulfilled and the codes are available for download, the order status changes to Available.

segment.source: Download and distribute promotional codes
segment.target: Download and distribute promotional codes

segment.source: To download a fulfilled promotional codes order and distribute the codes to users of your app:
segment.target: To download a fulfilled promotional codes order and distribute the codes to users of your app:

segment.source: On Windows Dev Center dashboard, return to the Promotional codes page for your app (expand Monetization and click Promotional codes).
segment.target: On Windows Dev Center dashboard, return to the Promotional codes page for your app (expand Monetization and click Promotional codes).

segment.source: Confirm that your order's status is Available.
segment.target: Confirm that your order's status is Available.

segment.source: Click the Download link for your order and save the provided file to your computer.
segment.target: Click the Download link for your order and save the provided file to your computer.

segment.source: This file contains information about your promotional codes order in tab-separated value (TSV) format.
segment.target: This file contains information about your promotional codes order in tab-separated value (TSV) format.

segment.source: Open the TSV file in the editor of your choice.
segment.target: Open the TSV file in the editor of your choice.

segment.source: For the best experience, open the TSV file in an application that can display the data in a tabular structure, such as Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: For the best experience, open the TSV file in an application that can display the data in a tabular structure, such as Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: However, you can alternatively open the file in any text editor.
segment.target: However, you can alternatively open the file in any text editor.

segment.source: The file contains the following columns of data for each code:
segment.target: The file contains the following columns of data for each code:

segment.source: Product name: The name of the app or IAP that the code is associated with.
segment.target: Product name: The name of the app or IAP that the code is associated with.

segment.source: Order name: The name of the order in which this code was fulfilled.
segment.target: Order name: The name of the order in which this code was fulfilled.

segment.source: Promotional code: The code itself.
segment.target: Promotional code: The code itself.

segment.source: This is a 5x5 string of alphanumeric characters separated by hyphens.
segment.target: This is a 5x5 string of alphanumeric characters separated by hyphens.

segment.source: For example:
segment.target: For example:

segment.source: DM3GY-M2GYM-6YMW6-4QHHT-23W2Z
segment.target: DM3GY-M2GYM-6YMW6-4QHHT-23W2Z

segment.source: Redeemable URL: The URL that a user can use to redeem the code and install your app or IAP.
segment.target: Redeemable URL: The URL that a user can use to redeem the code and install your app or IAP.

segment.source: The URL has the following format:
segment.target: The URL has the following format:

segment.source: https://account.microsoft.com/billing/redeem?mstoken=<promotional_code>
segment.target: https://account.microsoft.com/billing/redeem?mstoken=<promotional_code>

segment.source: Order date: The date you placed the order for this code.
segment.target: Order date: The date you placed the order for this code.

segment.source: Expire date: The date this code expires.
segment.target: Expire date: The date this code expires.

segment.source: Code ID: A unique ID for this code.
segment.target: Code ID: A unique ID for this code.

segment.source: Order ID: A unique ID for the order in which this code was fulfilled.
segment.target: Order ID: A unique ID for the order in which this code was fulfilled.

segment.source: Given to: An empty field that you can fill with a value that identifies the user you gave the code to.
segment.target: Given to: An empty field that you can fill with a value that identifies the user you gave the code to.

segment.source: Distribute the redeemable URLs to your users via any communication format you prefer (for example, email, SMS message, or printed cards).
segment.target: Distribute the redeemable URLs to your users via any communication format you prefer (for example, email, SMS message, or printed cards).

segment.source: We recommend that your communication includes the following:
segment.target: We recommend that your communication includes the following:

segment.source: An explanation of which app or IAP the promotional code is for, and optionally a description of why the user is receiving the code.
segment.target: An explanation of which app or IAP the promotional code is for, and optionally a description of why the user is receiving the code.

segment.source: The redeemable URL for the code.
segment.target: The redeemable URL for the code.

segment.source: Instructions that guide the user to visit the redeemable URL, log in using their Microsoft account, and follow the instructions to download and install your app.
segment.target: Instructions that guide the user to visit the redeemable URL, log in using their Microsoft account, and follow the instructions to download and install your app.

segment.source: Code redemption user experience
segment.target: Code redemption user experience

segment.source: After you distribute a redeemable URL to a user, the following steps describe the experience the user will follow to redeem your app.
segment.target: After you distribute a redeemable URL to a user, the following steps describe the experience the user will follow to redeem your app.

segment.source: The user clicks the redeemable URL.
segment.target: The user clicks the redeemable URL.

segment.source: The browser opens to an authenticated Redeem your code page at .
segment.target: The browser opens to an authenticated Redeem your code page at .

segment.source: This page includes a description of the app the user is about to redeem.
segment.target: This page includes a description of the app the user is about to redeem.

segment.source: The user clicks Redeem.
segment.target: The user clicks Redeem.

segment.source: The browser navigates to a Thank you page with a Get <your app name> link.
segment.target: The browser navigates to a Thank you page with a Get <your app name> link.

segment.source: Note Users will receive an error at this step if your app is not yet published.
segment.target: Note Users will receive an error at this step if your app is not yet published.

segment.source: The user clicks Get <your app name>.
segment.target: The user clicks Get <your app name>.

segment.source: If the user is on a computer with the Windows Store for Windows 10 or Windows 8.1 installed, the Windows Store opens to the overview page for the app.
segment.target: If the user is on a computer with the Windows Store for Windows 10 or Windows 8.1 installed, the Windows Store opens to the overview page for the app.

segment.source: The user can click Install to install the app for no charge.
segment.target: The user can click Install to install the app for no charge.

segment.source: If the user is on a computer or device that does not have the Windows Store installed, the browser opens to the Windows Store web page for the app.
segment.target: If the user is on a computer or device that does not have the Windows Store installed, the browser opens to the Windows Store web page for the app.

segment.source: The user can click Install to install the app for no charge.
segment.target: The user can click Install to install the app for no charge.

segment.source: Note In some cases the app page might display a Buy button instead of Install, even though the app was successfully redeemed via the promotional code.
segment.target: Note In some cases the app page might display a Buy button instead of Install, even though the app was successfully redeemed via the promotional code.

segment.source: The user can click Buy to install the app for no charge.
segment.target: The user can click Buy to install the app for no charge.

segment.source: Review your promotional codes
segment.target: Review your promotional codes

segment.source: There are several different ways to review your promotional code usage.
segment.target: There are several different ways to review your promotional code usage.

segment.source: To review a summary of promotional code orders for all your apps, visit the Dashboard overview page and locate the Promotional codes section on this page.
segment.target: To review a summary of promotional code orders for all your apps, visit the Dashboard overview page and locate the Promotional codes section on this page.

segment.source: This section displays the remaining active promotional codes for all your apps, the total number of redeemed promotional codes for all your apps, and the total number of promotional code orders you have placed for all your apps.
segment.target: This section displays the remaining active promotional codes for all your apps, the total number of redeemed promotional codes for all your apps, and the total number of promotional code orders you have placed for all your apps.

segment.source: To review a summary of promotional code orders for a specific app, navigate to the App overview page for the app and locate the Promotional codes section on this page.
segment.target: To review a summary of promotional code orders for a specific app, navigate to the App overview page for the app and locate the Promotional codes section on this page.

segment.source: This section displays the remaining active promotional codes for the app, the total number of redeemed promotional codes for the app, and the total number of promotional code orders you have placed for the app.
segment.target: This section displays the remaining active promotional codes for the app, the total number of redeemed promotional codes for the app, and the total number of promotional code orders you have placed for the app.

segment.source: To review a detailed summary of promotional code orders for a specific app, navigate to the Promotional codes page for your app (expand Monetization and click Promotional codes).
segment.target: To review a detailed summary of promotional code orders for a specific app, navigate to the Promotional codes page for your app (expand Monetization and click Promotional codes).

segment.source: You can review the following details for all current and inactive promotional codes for the app:
segment.target: You can review the following details for all current and inactive promotional codes for the app:

segment.source: Order name
segment.target: Order name

segment.source: App or IAP name
segment.target: App or IAP name

segment.source: Order date
segment.target: Order date

segment.source: Expire date
segment.target: Expire date

segment.source: Status
segment.target: Status

segment.source: You can also download an active order from this table.
segment.target: You can also download an active order from this table.
